hero.title: FAQ
hero.lead: Get all the information vou need on topics such as health and safety, registration, accessibility, and much more. Make sure to follow our Twitter for the latest news and updates.

questionsAndAnswers.question: When and where will RDC 2022 take place?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The conference will take place on September 9-10 at the Fort Mason Center, 2 Marina Blvd., San Francisco, CA 94123.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is included in the conference in-person pass?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The in-person pass is your ticket to the full RDC experience. This includes the keynotes, breakout sessions, Game Jam, Roblox Innovation Awards, networking events, meals, and virtual access to the conference.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is included in the virtual pass?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The virtual pass lets you access the live stream, plus on-demand recordings of all sessions (available within 24 hours following the live premiere).

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is there an age requirement to attend RDC 2022?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You must be 16 years of age or older to attend.

categories.title: Health and Safety

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you have security and a bag check?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We take your safety and security very seriously. RDC is a private event in a public space. A security perimeter will be in place for the safety of all attendees both days, so arrive early to allow time for security screenings and bag checks.
Yes, breakfast and lunch will be provided both days, and weâ€™ll have snacks and beverages available throughout the conference.
questionsAndAnswers.question: Will meals be provided?

categories.description: At a minimum, we will be following all mandated venue, municipality, and CDC guidelines. This list and all protocols are subject to change as the COVID-19 situation changes. Anyone experiencing cold or flu-like symptoms should stay home and get well.
